notification.contentToBeAnonymized: I thilpek chu 7 hnala chhinchhiahna a ni ang a, chumi hnuai ah
notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: I community-a i thilpek zawng zawng chu 7 hnala chhinchhiah leh archive a ni ang a, chumi hnuah i delete thei lovang a, i thlak thei lovang. Hnuai lamah i thilpek en rawh.
notification.groupContentToBeAnonymized: I group-a i thilpek zawng zawng chu 7 hnala chhinchhiah leh archive a ni ang a, chumi hnuah i delete thei lovang a, i thlak thei lovang. Hnuai lamah i thilpek en rawh.

email.possibleFraudFooter: Hnuai lam community link ah hian click rawh, admin in login la, menu atangin Fraud management tihzawh rawh.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Hmuhchhuah theih a ni lova thil thlengsualna ngaihtuahna 75% hmuhchhuah theihna
email.possibleFraudInformation: Hmangaihna in thil thlengsual ngaihtuahna hmuhchhuah a ni. Community admin interface hmangin chhinchhiah theih a ni. Hei hi thil thlengsual lo thil pawh a ni thei a, content delete turin chhinchhiahna thil taka siam tur a ni.
email.automaticToxicityDetection: Hei hi AI algorithms hmangin thil thlengsual tia sawi a ni a, he content chu toxicity estimate a ni. A ngai a chhan content chu delete thei a ni.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: AI algorithm hmangin he content-a thil thlengsual visual imagery flag a ni a. He algorithm hi adult, violent, medical, leh racy imagery tihchhuahna turin hman a ni. A ngai a chhan content chu delete thei a ni.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: AI algorithm chuan score diklo a tichak a, chumi hnuh chuan lo chhinchhiah lovin, hei email hi lo hrechiang dawn nia.
email.automaticToxicityEnglishText: Score hmang hmasa ber English tawng

email.reset_password_3: I password hi a thlak lovang bawk sehla, link danglamah hian i zawn a, thar ber siam tir loh chuan.
